content: **materials** yarn about 180-210 yd 165-210 m of worsted weight yarn i used malabrigo rios this is a lighter worsted weight yarn 210 yd/200 m per 100 g if your yarn is heavier you might run out of yarn or have a larger hat if you are worried about running short of yarn you can opt for a single brim needles size us 6 4 mm needles or whatever size is needed to make gauge 16-inch 40 cm circulars and double-pointed needles or your preferred method of medium- and small- circumference knitting in the round size us 4 3 5 mm needles or 1-2 sizes smaller than your main needles 16-inch circulars for knitting the brim ribbing gauge 20 stitches and 27 row in 4 in x 4 in 10 cm x 10 cm of stockinette using the larger needles sizing this hat is snug on my 22-inch 56 cm head due to the stretch of the cables i think it would fit about 18-22 inches 46-56 cm you could try a larger needle for a larger hat to adjust the length you can easily add or subtract a full repeat 16 rnds or a half repeat 8 rnds my finished hat is about 10 5 in 26 5 cm deep unfolded and 6 in 15 cm across laid flat
